remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然類別名稱是，項目名稱是`Item`。Although the class name is , the element name is `Item`. 在行動裝置的頁面上，您必須宣告項目使用[\<項目 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7152e195-e1d6-4a91-9dba-e0536a676e79)項目。On a mobile page, you declare an item by using the [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7152e195-e1d6-4a91-9dba-e0536a676e79)element. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在您管理中的項目物件透過類別使用選取的項目索引屬性。The following code example shows how you manipulate items in the object through the class by using the selected item's index of the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileListItemSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListItemSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileListItemSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListItemSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性為空字串，或永遠不會設定，或是以程式設計方式或透過建構函式，它會傳回的值指定的清單項目的屬性。If the property is an empty string or is never set, either programmatically or through the constructor, it returns the value of the property for the specified list item. 屬性可以指定使用`Text`屬性，或為內部文字。The property can be specified by using the `Text` attribute, or as inner text. 如果屬性已指定這兩種方式中，內部文字一定會優先。If the property is specified in both ways, the inner text always takes precedence. 不過，如果屬性以程式設計方式設定時，內部文字會自動移除和設定新屬性會優先。However, if the property is programmatically set, the inner text is automatically removed and the newly set property takes precedence.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性是`null`，呼叫以擷取值傳回的值屬性。If this property is `null`, a call to retrieve the value returns the value of the property.
